course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Unsaturated Soil Mechanics and Engineering
course.description: Fundamental principles, stress state variables, steady-state and transient flows, theory of shear strength and its measurements, soil stiffness, plastic and limit equilibrium analyses of earth pressures, slope stability and bearing capacity, critical state framework, instrumentation, engineering applications on slopes including static liquefaction of loose fill slopes, foundations, forensic studies such as slope failures.
course.prerequisites: CIVL 3740 or equivalent

reviews.author: HKUST-1
reviews.title: Very Fundamental Course for research
reviews.comment_content:
Chapter 1: Intro
Chapter 2: Physics Phases
Chapter 3: Stress State Variables
Chapter 4: Suctions
Chapter 5: Flow Laws and SDSWCC
Chapter 6: Permeability
Chapter 7: Flows
Chapter 8: Strength and Stiffness
Chapter 9: Limit Analysis
Chapter 10: Bioengineering / Slope / Landfill Cover

除咗chapter 10以外全部都係啲好basic嘅extended CIVL 3730嚟
多咗個叫做suction嘅term咁解

而chapter 9就係CIVL3740多咗suction嘅版本

成個course 基於Fredlund 本舊書去執出嚟
對我嚟講最有用嘅係學到唔同geolab入面嘅機嘅working principle同埋unsaturated soil 嘅behavior

不過由於好食3730嘅basic所以讀呢個course之前建議真係明晒成個3730啲野或者將Craig's Soil Mechanics成本書食晒落肚先
reviews.comment_teaching:
新嚟嘅reserach assistant professor
香港人 幾好傾
不過唔俾lecture recording
走咗堂就pk
reviews.comment_workload:
冇workload咁濟

得一份assignment同final exam

assignment可以一日做完
